Request the homechoice catalogue

Browse the homechoice catalogue to see how you can makeover your home with R200 000! But, while you wait to hear if you’re the lucky winner, here are a few affordable home décor ideas to get you excited:

  • Give your bedroom a new look with a homechoice bedding set. Choose from 100% cotton for summer to snuggly winter flannel for the perfect bedroom for every season. A fluffy blanket will add a layer of luxury, while new pillows will make sure you have the best support no matter whether you sleep on your back, tummy or side.
  • Shop our range of scatter cushions to brighten up the living room. This is an excellent way to stay on trend without breaking the budget, and you can switch colours and themes to suit your mood.
  • Add matching curtains and couch covers to take the room’s look to the next level, and your friends and family will think you’ve already won the homechoice home makeover competition.
  • Our matching toaster and kettle set will elevate the look of your countertop and will give your kitchen a mini update.
  • While we’re talking about the kitchen, what about your pots and pans? If the non-stick coating has worn off and made it frustrating to clean, investing in stainless steel or cast-iron cookware can be life changing.
  • Now that you’re cooking those memorable meals, you will want to serve them on a new dinner service with the correct red and white wine glasses.
  • Treat yourself to new towels with bathmats to match for a bathroom update that doesn’t break the bank. Add a glass or marble soap & hand lotion dispenser set to give your bathroom a 5-star look and feel.
  • Don’t forget your entertainment area. A new outdoor lounge set will have you inviting friends over for more braais as you sit, eat and chat until the early hours of the morning.
